FuncDef: This command configures allows options to be associated with the authentication key.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that IS-IS should use RFC 5304 encoding of the authentication information. It is only applicable if used with the IS-IS protocol. All other protocols should ignore this configuration command.

Specifies that IS-IS should use RFC 5310 encoding of the authentication information. It is only applicable if used with the IS-IS protocol. All other protocols should ignore this configuration command.
